thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 28 of 3593
thread.title: Joan

author: Joan
title: Joan
text:
I did not order through you. I ordered the book through Amazon, but somehow you got involved so now I have two books. The one you sent is not in good condition and not worth the money you charged me. I have not a clue as to how you got involved in my Amazon order. Would love to have my credit card credited with this purchase and I'll donate your book to the local library.
Joan
